div1.p:
I do hereby Scertify that in the month of
May 1783
Majr John Reid came to the Settlement on Cumberland River, in the State of North Carolina with Talks from the Governor of Virginia, to the chiefs of theChicasaws, at which Time he the said Majr Reid delivered me a letter from
Colo John Donaldson, a commissioner to Treat with the Chicasaws, Requesting me to furnish Majr Reid with such guids as should be required to go with him to the Chicasaws Nation, upon which Majr Reid applied to me to know the number that would be necessary for the above journey upon which I tould him, I thought two was as small a number as he possably could think to go with which number he ingaged and no more
